Magic Notes:
Wisdom Druid Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level D1
Desert Druid: Cannot Wild Shape into plant creature; May Wild Shape into vermin
Dunemeld: May assume insubstantial sand form
Forge Ring: Create and mend magic rings
Heighten Spell: Increase chosen spell level
Spontaneous Druid Spell: Cast Summon Nature's Ally in place of known spell
Wild Shape: Change into creature of size diminutive-huge/elemental/plant for 18 hr 8/dy
